categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Smythe was a Human male who served as a corporal in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. He was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock, where he dispensed gear to soldiers and other agents of the Empire.

Corporal Smythe first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the PvP Ranked Enhancements vendor aboard Vaiken Spacedock. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
